title: A machine learning language model approach to evaluating mental health awareness content across Spanish-and English-language social media posts on Twitter
details: MJ DuPont-Reyes, W Zou, J Li, AP Villatoro, L Tang - Social Psychiatry and …, 2025
abstract: Purpose Mental health information appears on social media in varying levels of quality and may or may not be productive information to users, particularly in relation to healthcare decision-making and community living among diverse populations …
